description: Contact Dr. Alison Buchan (abuchan@utk.edu) with any questions.

groups.group_name: The University of Tennessee, Knoxville REU Protocols

components.data:
Plug the outflow port of Sterivex cartridge using cha-seal clay.

Ensure that incubator is set to 65°C.

Place rotator in the incubator.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Plug the outflow port of Sterivex cartridge using cha-seal clay.

Ensure that incubator is set to 65°C.

Place rotator in the incubator.

components.data: Preparation
components.name: Section

source_data.reagent_name: Sterivex™ filter unit without filling bell

components.data: Add CTAB extraction solution to each cartridge using a needle and syringe.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add CTAB extraction solution to each cartridge using a needle and syringe.

components.data: Lysis
components.name: Section

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of gDNA extraction from Sterivex filters
source_data.annotation: Dispense liquid slowly and be careful to avoid air bubbles that will clog the port.
source_data.thread_text: Dispense liquid slowly and be careful to avoid air bubbles that will clog the port.
source_data.body: Dispense liquid slowly and be careful to avoid air bubbles that will clog the port.

source_data.reagent_linfor: 2% CTAB 100mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.0 20mM EDTA, pH 8.0 1.4M Sodium Chloride (NaCl)

components.data: Add 65μL of Proteinase K (10mg/mL) and 65μL of Lysozyme (10mg/mL) to each cartridge using a needle and syringe.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 65μL of Proteinase K (10mg/mL) and 65μL of Lysozyme (10mg/mL) to each cartridge using a needle and syringe.

components.data: Lysis
components.name: Section

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 3 of gDNA extraction from Sterivex filters
source_data.annotation: These may be combined and added to each tube in a single aliquot.
source_data.thread_text: These may be combined and added to each tube in a single aliquot.
source_data.body: These may be combined and added to each tube in a single aliquot.

components.data: Add 162μL of filter-sterilized SDS (10%) to each tube. Invert to mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 162μL of filter-sterilized SDS (10%) to each tube. Invert to mix.

components.data: Lysis
components.name: Section

components.data: Cap open end of each cartridge with a luer lock cap and incubate in rotary agitator at 65°C for 2 hours.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Cap open end of each cartridge with a luer lock cap and incubate in rotary agitator at 65°C for 2 hours.

components.data: Lysis
components.name: Section

components.data: Label 2 sets of 2mL centrifuge tubes with sample name. One set will be kept and frozen (-20°C) while the other set will be used for further extraction.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Label 2 sets of 2mL centrifuge tubes with sample name. One set will be kept and frozen (-20°C) while the other set will be used for further extraction.

components.data: Lysis
components.name: Section

components.data:
Using 3mL luer-lock syringe, attach to Sterivex cartridge and draw out fluid.

Depress 2mL of sample material  into the first storage 2mL centrifuge tube, then pipette out 800μL of this solution into other labeled 2mL tube for further extraction.

Place the 1st 2mL tube into the freezer.

 

Start the cool-down sequence in the microcentrifuge (set to 4°C).
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Using 3mL luer-lock syringe, attach to Sterivex cartridge and draw out fluid.

Depress 2mL of sample material  into the first storage 2mL centrifuge tube, then pipette out 800μL of this solution into other labeled 2mL tube for further extraction.

Place the 1st 2mL tube into the freezer.

 

Start the cool-down sequence in the microcentrifuge (set to 4°C).

components.data: Lysis
components.name: Section

components.data: Add 800μL of phenol:chloroform:isoamyl alcohol (PCI, 25:24:1, pH 8.0) to each tube and vortex to mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 800μL of phenol:chloroform:isoamyl alcohol (PCI, 25:24:1, pH 8.0) to each tube and vortex to mix.

components.data: Precipitation
components.name: Section

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 9 of gDNA extraction from Sterivex filters
source_data.annotation: Do this step in a fume hood.
source_data.thread_text: Do this step in a fume hood.
source_data.body: Do this step in a fume hood.

components.data:
Add 800μL of chloroform:isoamyl alcohol (CI, 24:1) to each tube.

Invert and vortex to mix thoroughly, then centrifuge at 15,000rpm for 5 minutes.

Transfer upper aqueous phase to a new 2mL centrifuge tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Add 800μL of chloroform:isoamyl alcohol (CI, 24:1) to each tube.

Invert and vortex to mix thoroughly, then centrifuge at 15,000rpm for 5 minutes.

Transfer upper aqueous phase to a new 2mL centrifuge tube.

components.data: Precipitation
components.name: Section

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 11 of gDNA extraction from Sterivex filters
source_data.annotation: Repeat this step again. The second time, transfer the upper aqueous phase to a 1.5mL centrifuge tube.
source_data.thread_text: Repeat this step again. The second time, transfer the upper aqueous phase to a 1.5mL centrifuge tube.
source_data.body: Repeat this step again. The second time, transfer the upper aqueous phase to a 1.5mL centrifuge tube.

components.data:
Centrifuge at 4°C, 10,000rpm for 5 minutes.

Transfer upper aqueous phase to a new 2mL centrifuge tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Centrifuge at 4°C, 10,000rpm for 5 minutes.

Transfer upper aqueous phase to a new 2mL centrifuge tube.

components.data: Precipitation
components.name: Section

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 10 of gDNA extraction from Sterivex filters
source_data.annotation: Be careful to not aspirate the interface between the aqueous phases. Do not attempt to remove all of the upper aqueous phase.
source_data.thread_text: Be careful to not aspirate the interface between the aqueous phases. Do not attempt to remove all of the upper aqueous phase.
source_data.body: Be careful to not aspirate the interface between the aqueous phases. Do not attempt to remove all of the upper aqueous phase.

components.data:
Add 450μL of room temperature isopropanol (100%) to each tube, inverting gently to mix.

Incubate at room temperature for 2 hours to overnight.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Add 450μL of room temperature isopropanol (100%) to each tube, inverting gently to mix.

Incubate at room temperature for 2 hours to overnight.

components.data: Precipitation
components.name: Section

components.data:
Centrifuge the tubes at 10,000rpm for 20 minutes.

Carefully decant by pouring liquid out of the tube and into a small clean petri dish, then blot tubes dry using a paper towel on the benchtop. You can also aspirate the liquid using a pipette.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Centrifuge the tubes at 10,000rpm for 20 minutes.

Carefully decant by pouring liquid out of the tube and into a small clean petri dish, then blot tubes dry using a paper towel on the benchtop. You can also aspirate the liquid using a pipette.

components.data: Precipitation
components.name: Section

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 13 of gDNA extraction from Sterivex filters
source_data.annotation: The petri dish serves to catch the DNA pellet if it is accidentally poured out during this step.
source_data.thread_text: The petri dish serves to catch the DNA pellet if it is accidentally poured out during this step.
source_data.body: The petri dish serves to catch the DNA pellet if it is accidentally poured out during this step.

components.data:
Add 1.4mL of 70% ethanol to each tube and gently invert several times to mix.

Centrifuge at 10,000rpm for 5 minutes.

Pour off ethanol.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Add 1.4mL of 70% ethanol to each tube and gently invert several times to mix.

Centrifuge at 10,000rpm for 5 minutes.

Pour off ethanol.

components.data: Purification
components.name: Section

components.data: Dry tubes in laminar hood for 10-15 minutes or until completely dry. Note that pellets may become dislodged from sides of tube, so take care not to invert tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dry tubes in laminar hood for 10-15 minutes or until completely dry. Note that pellets may become dislodged from sides of tube, so take care not to invert tubes.

components.data: Purification
components.name: Section

components.data: Add 50μL of sterile Nuclease free ultra-pure water to each tube and gently pipet to dissolve DNA.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 50μL of sterile Nuclease free ultra-pure water to each tube and gently pipet to dissolve DNA.

components.data: Purification
components.name: Section

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 16 of gDNA extraction from Sterivex filters
source_data.annotation: It may be helpful to either pre-heat the water to 50°C or to incubate the tubes at 37°C for 1-2 hrs to facilitate dissolution.
source_data.thread_text: It may be helpful to either pre-heat the water to 50°C or to incubate the tubes at 37°C for 1-2 hrs to facilitate dissolution.
source_data.body: It may be helpful to either pre-heat the water to 50°C or to incubate the tubes at 37°C for 1-2 hrs to facilitate dissolution.

components.data: Measure the DNA concentration using NanoDrop and freeze samples at -80°C. Record 260/280 ratio as well as DNA concentration.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Measure the DNA concentration using NanoDrop and freeze samples at -80°C. Record 260/280 ratio as well as DNA concentration.
